question: At TechFood Inc., the data engineering team is developing an AI-powered personal nutritional coach. They want this assistant to identify nutritional content of a dish based on image inputs. Which AI model and platform should they consider using to achieve this functionality?
options: Llama 4 Maverick model on IBM watsonx
explanation: ResNet50 is a convolutional neural network model suitable for image recognition tasks, making it ideal for identifying nutritional content from images.
